wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Wepo ehe ko yin gbedewema na sọn [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported] gbedewema.
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: nado yi, bo má podọ nado ze azọ́n lọ do jẹhọnmẹ
wm-license-cc-free-to-remix-text: nado yíi zán po azọ́n devo po
wm-license-cc-conditions: To nubiọtomẹsi he bọdego ehelẹ glọ:
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: A dona na sisi he jẹ, bo wleawuna notẹn intẹnẹt tọn dé na gbedewema lọ, bo sọ dohia eyin diọdo dé ko wá aimẹ. A sọgan wamọ to aliho he sọgbe depope mẹ, ṣigba e ni ma taidi dọ gbedewema-namẹtọ lọ nagbe we kavi zan we blo.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Na eyin dọ a vọ nude jlado, lẹ́ nude do kavi yi nude dogọ na azọ́nwanu ehe, a dona ze nuyidogọ towe ehelẹ jo gbọn [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses gbedewema dopolọ kavi dehe di yedelẹ] gblamẹ taidi vonọtaun lọ.
